name: CUSTOM Hero #12
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_top_mobile = section.settings.padding_top_mobile
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign padding_bottom_mobile = section.settings.padding_bottom_mobile
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign count_videos = 0
  for block in section.blocks
    if block.type == "video"
      assign count_videos = count_videos | plus: 1
    endif
  endfor

  assign count_scrolling_texts = 0
  for block in section.blocks
    if block.type == "scrolling_text"
      assign count_scrolling_texts = count_scrolling_texts | plus: 1
    endif
  endfor

  assign body_gap_mobile = section.settings.body_gap_mobile
  assign body_gap = section.settings.body_gap

  assign content_horizontal_align_mobile = section.settings.content_horizontal_align_mobile
  assign content_horizontal_align = section.settings.content_horizontal_align
  assign content_vertical_align = section.settings.content_vertical_align
  assign content_padding_vertical = section.settings.content_padding_vertical
  assign content_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_vertical_mobile

   assign text_align = ""
  if content_horizontal_align == "start"
    assign text_align = "left"
  elsif content_horizontal_align == "center"
    assign text_align = "center"
  else
    assign text_align = "right"
  endif

  assign text_align_mobile = ""
  if content_horizontal_align_mobile == "start"
    assign text_align_mobile = "left"
  elsif content_horizontal_align_mobile == "center"
    assign text_align_mobile = "center"
  else
    assign text_align_mobile = "right"
  endif

  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap
  assign slider_gap_mobile = section.settings.slider_gap_mobile
  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile

  assign video_border_thickness = section.settings.video_border_thickness
  assign video_border_color = section.settings.video_border_color
  assign video_ratio = section.settings.video_ratio
  assign video_ratio_mobile = section.settings.video_ratio_mobile
  assign video_radius = section.settings.video_radius
  assign video_overlay = section.settings.video_overlay

  assign use_progress = section.settings.use_progress

  assign sound_size_mobile = section.settings.sound_size_mobile
  assign sound_size = section.settings.sound_size
  assign sound_border_thickness = section.settings.sound_border_thickness
  assign sound_border_color = section.settings.sound_border_color
  assign sound_border_hover_color = section.settings.sound_border_hover_color
  assign sound_bg_color = section.settings.sound_bg_color
  assign sound_bg_hover_color = section.settings.sound_bg_hover_color
  assign sound_icon_color = section.settings.sound_icon_color
  assign sound_icon_hover_color = section.settings.sound_icon_hover_color
  assign use_sound = section.settings.use_sound

  assign play_size_mobile = section.settings.play_size_mobile
  assign play_size = section.settings.play_size
  assign play_border_thickness = section.settings.play_border_thickness
  assign play_border_color = section.settings.play_border_color
  assign play_border_hover_color = section.settings.play_border_hover_color
  assign play_bg_color = section.settings.play_bg_color
  assign play_bg_hover_color = section.settings.play_bg_hover_color
  assign play_icon_color = section.settings.play_icon_color
  assign play_icon_hover_color = section.settings.play_icon_hover_color

  assign scrolling_velocity = section.settings.scrolling_velocity
  assign scrolling_velocity_mobile = section.settings.scrolling_velocity_mobile
  assign scrolling_position = section.settings.scrolling_position

  assign reverse_direction = section.settings.reverse_direction
  assign pause_hover = section.settings.pause_hover

  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_mr = section.settings.text_mr
  assign text_mr_mobile = section.settings.text_mr_mobile

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_color = section.settings.arrow_icon_color
  assign arrow_icon_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_icon_hover_color
  
-%}

{%- style -%}
  
  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    position: relative;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top_mobile }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom_mobile }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .hero-body-{{ section.id }} {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
    gap: {{ body_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .hero-content-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ item_padding_vertical_mobile }}px 0px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
  }

  .hero-slide-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    min-width: 0px;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .hero-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    min-width: 0px;
    width: 100%;
  }

  .hero-slide-{{ section.id }} {
    border-radius: {{ video_radius }}px;
    border: {{ video_border_thickness }}px solid {{ video_border_color }};
    overflow: hidden !important;
    cursor: pointer !important;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
  }

  .hero-slide-{{ section.id }} video,
  .hero-slide-{{ section.id }} > svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    box-shadow: none;
    border: 0px;
  }

  .hero-slide-{{ section.id }} > svg {
    background-color: #F7F7F7;
  }

  .hero-slide-{{ section.id }}:after {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    z-index: 1;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .hero-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(.swiper-slide-active):after {
    background-color: {{ video_overlay | hex_to_rgba: 0.6 }};
  }

  .hero-sound-{{ section.id }} {
    width: {{ sound_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ sound_size_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ sound_border_thickness }}px solid {{ sound_border_color }};
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: {{ sound_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.3 }};
    display: flex !important;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    position: absolute;
    top: 24px;
    right: 12px;
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .hero-sound-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    border: {{ sound_border_thickness }}px solid {{ sound_border_hover_color }};
    background: {{ sound_bg_hover_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.3 }};
  }

  .hero-sound-{{ section.id }} svg {
    height: 55%;
    width: 55%;
  }

  .hero-sound-{{ section.id }} svg {
    fill: {{ sound_icon_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .hero-sound-{{ section.id }}:hover svg {
    fill: {{ sound_icon_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .hero-sound-{{ section.id }} .hero-unmute-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .hero-sound-{{ section.id }}.active .hero-unmute-{{ section.id }} {
    display: block;
  }

  .hero-sound-{{ section.id }}.active .hero-mute-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .hero-play-{{ section.id }} {
    width: {{ play_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ play_size_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ play_border_thickness }}px solid {{ play_border_color }};
    border-radius: 50%;
    background: {{ play_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.3 }};
    display: none;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .hero-play-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: flex;
  }

  .hero-play-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    border: {{ play_border_thickness }}px solid {{ play_border_hover_color }};
    background: {{ play_bg_hover_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.3 }};
  }

  .hero-play-{{ section.id }} svg {
    height: 50%;
    width: 50%;
  }

  .hero-play-{{ section.id }} svg {
    fill: {{ play_icon_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .hero-play-{{ section.id }}:hover svg {
    fill: {{ play_icon_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  #progress{{ section.id | replate: '-', '' }} {
    width: calc(100% - 20px);
    position: absolute;
    top: 10px;
    left: 10px;
    z-index: 1;
    height: 5px;
  }

  #progress{{ section.id | replate: '-', '' }}[value] {
    appearance: none;
    border: none;
    color: #ffffff;
  }

  #progress{{ section.id | replate: '-', '' }}[value]::-webkit-progress-value {
    background: white;
    transition: width 0.5s linear;
  }
  
  #progress{{ section.id | replate: '-', '' }}[value]::-moz-progress-bar {
    background: #ede8e8:
  }

  .hero-slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 57%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    z-index: 2;
    display: none;;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    overflow: hidden;
    background-color: transparent;
    background-color: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .hero-slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    background-color: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    border-color: {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
  }

  .hero-slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
  }

  .hero-slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_icon_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .hero-slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover svg path {
    fill: {{ arrow_icon_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }
  
  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .hero-body-{{ section.id }} {
      grid-template-columns: calc(55% - {{ body_gap | times: 0.5 }}px) calc(45% - {{ body_gap | times: 0.5 }}px );
      gap: {{ body_gap }}px;
      align-items: {{ content_vertical_align }};
    }

    .hero-content-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ item_padding_vertical }}px 0px;
      align-items: {{ content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .hero-slide-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .hero-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(.swiper-slide-active) {
      mask-image: linear-gradient(90deg,#000 -30%,transparent 85%);
    }

    .hero-slide-{{ section.id }}:not(.swiper-slide-active):after {
      background-color: transparent;
    }

    .hero-sound-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ sound_size }}px;
      height: {{ sound_size }}px;
    }

    .hero-play-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ play_size }}px;
      height: {{ play_size }}px;
    }

    .hero-slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}rem;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if video_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
    <style>
        .hero-slide-{{ section.id }} {
            aspect-ratio: 9.6/14; 
        }
    </style>
{% elsif video_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
    <style>
        .hero-slide-{{ section.id }}{
            aspect-ratio: 12/10; 
        }
    </style>
{% elsif video_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
    <style>
        .hero-slide-{{ section.id }} {
            aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
        }
    </style>
{% else %}
    <style>
        .hero-slide-{{ section.id }} {
            aspect-ratio: auto; 
        }
    </style>
{% endif %}

{% if video_ratio == "portrait" %}
    <style>
        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .hero-slide-{{ section.id }} {
                aspect-ratio: 9.6/14; 
            } 
        }
    </style>
{% elsif video_ratio == "landscape" %}
    <style>
        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .hero-slide-{{ section.id }} {
                aspect-ratio: 12/10; 
            }
        }
    </style>
{% elsif video_ratio == "square" %}
    <style>
        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .hero-slide-{{ section.id }} {
                aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
            }
        }
    </style>
{% else %}
    <style>
        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .hero-slide-{{ section.id }} {
                aspect-ratio: auto; 
            }
        }
    </style>
{% endif %}

{% for block in section.blocks %}
    {% if block.type == "heading" %}
        <style>
            {{  block.settings.heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
            
            .hero-heading-{{ block.id }} {
                text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }};
                margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt_mobile }}px;
            }

            .hero-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
                margin: 0;
                font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size_mobile }}px;
                color: {{ block.settings.heading_color }};
                line-height: {{ block.settings.heading_height }}%;
                text-transform: unset;
            }

            @media(min-width: 1024px) {
                
                .hero-heading-{{ block.id }} {
                    text-align: {{ text_align }};
                    margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt }}px;
                    max-width: {{ block.settings.heading_width }}%;
                }

                .hero-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
                    font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size }}px;
                }
            }
        </style>

        {% if block.settings.heading_custom %}
            <style>
                .hero-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
                    font-family: {{ block.settings.heading_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.heading_font.fallback_families }};
                    font-weight: {{ block.settings.heading_font.weight }};
                    font-style: {{ block.settings.heading_font.style }};
                }
            </style>
        {% endif %}

    {% elsif block.type == "text" %}
        <style>
            {{ block.settings.text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
            
            .hero-text-{{ block.id }} {
                text-align: {{ text_align_mobile }};
                margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt_mobile }}px;
            }

            .hero-text-{{ block.id }} * {
                margin: 0;
                font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size_mobile }}px;
                color: {{ block.settings.text_color }};
                line-height: {{ block.settings.text_height }}%;
                text-transform: unset;
            }

            @media(min-width: 1024px) {
                
                .hero-text-{{ block.id }} {
                    text-align: {{ text_align }};
                    margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt }}px;
                }

                .hero-text-{{ block.id }} * {
                    font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size }}px;
                }
            }
        </style>

        {% if block.settings.text_custom %}
            <style>
                .hero-text-{{ block.id }} {
                    font-family: {{ block.settings.text_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.text_font.fallback_families }};
                    font-weight: {{ block.settings.text_font.weight }};
                    font-style: {{ block.settings.text_font.style }};
                }
            </style>
        {% endif %}

    {% elsif block.type == "badge" %}
        <style>
            {{ block.settings.badge_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

            .hero-badge-{{ block.id }} {
              margin: 0;
              display: flex;
              align-items: center;
              justify-content: center;
              max-width: fit-content;
              width: 100%;
              text-align: center;
              padding: {{ block.settings.badge_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ block.settings.badge_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
              background-color: {{ block.settings.badge_bg_color }};
              border-radius: {{ block.settings.badge_radius }}px;
              overflow: hidden;
              border: {{ block.settings.badge_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.badge_border_color }};
              margin-top: {{ block.settings.badge_mt_mobile }}px;
              font-size: {{ block.settings.badge_size_mobile }}px;
              color: {{ block.settings.badge_color }};
              line-height: {{ block.settings.badge_height }}%;
              text-transform: unset;
              text-decoration: none;
            }

            @media(min-width: 1024px) {

                .hero-badge-{{ block.id }} {
                  padding: {{ block.settings.badge_padding_vertical }}px {{ block.settings.badge_padding_horizontal }}px;
                  margin-top: {{ block.settings.badge_mt }}px;
                  font-size: {{ block.settings.badge_size }}px;
                }
            }
        </style>

        {% if block.settings.badge_custom %}
            <style>
                .hero-badge-{{ block.id }} {
                    font-family: {{ block.settings.badge_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.badge_font.fallback_families }};
                    font-weight: {{ block.settings.badge_font.weight }};
                    font-style: {{ block.settings.badge_font.style }};
                }
            </style>
        {% endif %}

    {% elsif block.type == "product" %}

      <style>
        {{  block.settings.title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
        {{  block.settings.price_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
        {{  block.settings.button_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

        .hero-product-{{ block.id }} {
          padding: {{ block.settings.product_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ block.settings.product_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
          background-color: {{ block.settings.product_bg_color }};
          border-radius: {{ block.settings.product_radius }}px;
          overflow: hidden;
          border: {{ block.settings.product_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.product_border_color }};
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.product_mt_mobile }}px;
          background-color: {{ block.settings.product_bg_color }};
          display: flex;
          gap: {{ block.settings.product_gap_mobile }}px;
          align-items: center;
        }

        .hero-product-image-{{ block.id }} {
          flex: 0 0 {{ block.settings.image_width_mobile }}px;
          border: {{ block.settings.image_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.product_image_border_color }};
          border-radius: {{ block.settings.image_radius }}px;
          overflow: hidden;
          /* background-color: #F7F7F7; */
        }

        .hero-product-image-{{ block.id }} img,
        .hero-product-image-{{ block.id }} svg {
          display: block;
          width: 100%;
          height: 100%;
          object-fit: cover;
        }

        .hero-product-content-{{ block.id }} {
          flex: 1 1 auto;
        }

        .hero-product-title-{{ block.id }} {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.title_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.title_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.title_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          font-weight: 700;
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }
      
        .hero-product-price-{{ block.id }} {
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.price_mt }}px;
          display: none;
          align-items: center;
          gap: 5px;
        }
      
        .hero-product-price-{{ block.id }} * {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.price_size }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.price_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.price_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          font-style: normal;
        }
      
        .hero-product-compare-price-{{ block.id }} {
          font-size: {{ block.settings.price_size | times: 0.8 }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.price_original_color }};
          text-decoration: line-through !important;
        }

        .hero-product-button-{{ block.id }} {
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          justify-content: center;
          gap: 10px;
          width: 100%;
          max-width: fit-content;
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.button_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.button_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.button_height }}%;
          text-align: center;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          padding: {{ block.settings.button_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ block.settings.button_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
          border-radius: {{ block.settings.button_radius }}px;
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }
      
        .hero-product-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
          color: {{ block.settings.button_hover_color }};
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }
      
        .hero-product-button-{{ block.id }} svg {
          width: 14px;
          height: 14px;
        }
      
        .hero-product-button-{{ block.id }} svg path {
          fill: {{ block.settings.button_color }};
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }
      
        .hero-product-button-{{ block.id }}:hover svg path {
          fill: {{ block.settings.button_hover_color }};
          transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
        }

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          .hero-product-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.product_mt }}px;
            padding: {{ block.settings.product_padding_vertical }}px {{ block.settings.product_padding_horizontal }}px;
            gap: {{ block.settings.product_gap }}px;
          }

          .hero-product-image-{{ block.id }} {
            flex: 0 1 {{ block.settings.image_width }}px;
          }

          .hero-product-title-{{ block.id }} {
            font-size: {{ block.settings.title_size }}px;
          }

          .hero-product-price-{{ block.id }} {
            display: flex;
          }

          .hero-product-button-{{ block.id }} {
            padding: {{ block.settings.button_padding_vertical }}px {{ block.settings.button_padding_horizontal }}px;
            font-size: {{ block.settings.button_size }}px;
          }
          
        }
      </style>

      {% if block.settings.title_custom %}
        <style>
          .hero-product-title-{{ block.id }} {
              font-family: {{ block.settings.title_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.title_font.fallback_families }};
              font-weight: {{ block.settings.title_font.weight }};
              font-style: {{ block.settings.title_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

      {% if block.settings.price_custom %}
        <style>
          .hero-product-price-{{ block.id }} * {
              font-family: {{ block.settings.price_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.price_font.fallback_families }};
              font-weight: {{ block.settings.price_font.weight }};
              font-style: {{ block.settings.price_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

      {% if block.settings.button_custom %}
        <style>
          .hero-product-button-{{ block.id }} {
              font-family: {{ block.settings.button_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.button_font.fallback_families }};
              font-weight: {{ block.settings.button_font.weight }};
              font-style: {{ block.settings.button_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

      {% if block.settings.button_style == "non_outline" or block.settings.button_style == "non_outline_arrow" %}
        <style>
          .hero-product-button-{{ block.id }} {
            background-color: {{ block.settings.button_bg_color }};
          }
      
          .hero-product-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            background-color: {{ block.settings.button_bg_hover_color }};
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.button_style == "outline" or block.settings.button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
        <style>
          .hero-product-button-{{ block.id }} {
            background-color: {{ block.settings.button_bg_color }};
            border: {{ block.settings.button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.button_border_color }};
          }
      
          .hero-product-button-{{ block.id }}:hover {
            background-color: {{ block.settings.button_bg_hover_color }};
            border: {{ block.settings.button_border_thickness }}px solid {{ block.settings.button_border_hover_color }};
          }
        </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.button_style == "link" %}
        <style>
          .hero-product-button-{{ block.id }} {
            padding: 0px !important;
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

      {% if block.settings.image_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
          <style>
              .hero-product-image-{{ block.id }} {
                  aspect-ratio: 9.6/12; 
              }
          </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.image_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
          <style>
              .hero-product-image-{{ block.id }}{
                  aspect-ratio: 12/10; 
              }
          </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.image_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
          <style>
              .hero-product-image-{{ block.id }} {
                  aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
              }
          </style>
      {% else %}
          <style>
              .hero-product-image-{{ block.id }} {
                  aspect-ratio: auto; 
              }
          </style>
      {% endif %}
      
      {% if block.settings.image_ratio == "portrait" %}
          <style>
              @media(min-width: 1024px) {
                  .hero-product-image-{{ block.id }} {
                      aspect-ratio: 9.6/12; 
                  } 
              }
          </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.image_ratio == "landscape" %}
          <style>
              @media(min-width: 1024px) {
                  .hero-product-image-{{ block.id }} {
                      aspect-ratio: 12/10; 
                  }
              }
          </style>
      {% elsif block.settings.image_ratio == "square" %}
          <style>
              @media(min-width: 1024px) {
                  .hero-product-image-{{ block.id }} {
                      aspect-ratio: 12/12; 
                  }
              }
          </style>
      {% else %}
          <style>
              @media(min-width: 1024px) {
                  .hero-product-image-{{ block.id }} {
                      aspect-ratio: auto; 
                  }
              }
          </style>
      {% endif %}

    {% elsif block.type == 'scrolling_text' %}
      <style>

        {{ block.settings.text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
        
        .hero-scrolling-wrap-{{ block.id }} {
          width: 200vw;
          left: -50%;
          position: relative;
          display: -webkit-box;
          display: -ms-flexbox;
          display: flex;
          -ms-flex-wrap: nowrap;
          flex-wrap: nowrap;
          background-attachment: scroll !important;
          transform-origin: center;
          padding: {{ block.settings.scrolling_space_around_mobile }}px 0px;
        }
      
        .hero-scrolling-list-{{ block.id }} {
          display: -webkit-box;
          display: -ms-flexbox;
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          white-space: nowrap;
          background-attachment: scroll !important;
          -webkit-animation: ticker{{ block.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ block.settings.scrolling_velocity_mobile }}s infinite linear;
          animation: ticker{{ block.id | replace: '-', '' }} {{ block.settings.scrolling_velocity_mobile }}s infinite linear;
          flex-shrink: 0;
        }
      
        .hero-scrolling-item-{{ block.id }} {
          display: flex;
          align-items: center;
          background-attachment: scroll !important;
          margin-right: {{ block.settings.text_mr_mobile }}px;
          flex-shrink: 0;
          text-decoration: none;
        }
      
        .hero-scrolling-text-{{ block.id }} {
          display: inline-block;
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.text_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.text_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          font-weight: 700;
        }

        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          .hero-scrolling-wrap-{{ block.id }} {
            position: absolute;
            padding: {{ block.settings.scrolling_space_around }}px 0px;
          }
          
          .hero-scrolling-list-{{ block.id }} {
            animation-duration: {{ block.settings.scrolling_velocity }}s;
          }
      
          .hero-scrolling-item-{{ block.id }} {
            margin-right: {{ block.settings.text_mr }}px;
          }
          
          .hero-scrolling-text-{{ block.id }} {
            font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size }}px;
          }
        }

      </style>

      {% if block.settings.text_custom %}
        <style>
          .hero-scrolling-text-{{ block.id }} {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.text_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.text_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.text_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.text_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
      
      {% if block.settings.reverse_direction %}
        <style>
          @keyframes ticker{{ block.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
            0% {
              transform: translateX(-50%);
            }
            100% {
              transform: translateX(0%);
            }
          }
        </style>
      {% else %}
        <style>
          @keyframes ticker{{ block.id | replace: '-', '' }} {
            0% {
              transform: translateX(0%);
            }
            100% {
              transform: translateX(-50%);
            }
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
      
      {% if block.settings.pause_hover %}
        <style>
          .hero-scrolling-wrap-{{ block.id }}:hover .hero-scrolling-list-{{ block.id }} {
             animation-play-state: paused 
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
      
      {% if block.settings.scrolling_position == "top" %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .hero-scrolling-wrap-{{ block.id }} {
              top: 10px;
            }
          }
        </style>
      {% else %}
        <style>
          @media(min-width: 1024px) {
            .hero-scrolling-wrap-{{ block.id }} {
              bottom: 10px;
            }
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
        
    {% endif %}

{% endfor %}


<div class="section-{{ section.id }} hero-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    {% for block in section.blocks %}
      {% if block.type == "scrolling_text" %}
        {% if block.settings.scrolling_position == "top" %}
          <div class="hero-scrolling-wrap-{{ block.id }}">
            <div class="hero-scrolling-list-{{ block.id }}">
              {% for item in (1..10) %}
                <{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="hero-scrolling-item-{{ block.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                    <p class="hero-scrolling-text-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                </{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
            <div class="hero-scrolling-list-{{ block.id }}">
              {% for item in (1..10) %}
                <{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="hero-scrolling-item-{{ block.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                    <p class="hero-scrolling-text-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                </{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
          </div>
        {% endif %}
      {% endif %}
    {% endfor %}
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      <div class="hero-body-{{ section.id }} {% if count_videos == 0 %}only{% endif %}">
        <div class="hero-content-{{ section.id }}">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            {% case block.type %}

              {% when 'badge' %}
                <{% if block.settings.badge_url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.badge_url }}"{% else %}span{% endif %} class="hero-badge-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.badge }}</{% if block.settings.badge_url != blank %}a{% else %}span{% endif %}>
              
              {% when 'heading' %}
                <div class="hero-heading-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading }}</div>
              
              {% when 'text' %}
                <div class="hero-text-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>

              {% when 'product' %}
                <div class="hero-product-{{ block.id }}">
                  <div class="hero-product-image-{{ block.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.product.featured_image != blank %}
                      <img src="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image | image_url }}" alt="{{ block.settings.product.featured_image.alt }}">
                    {% else %}
                      <svg preserveAspectRatio="xMidYMid slice" width="448" height="448" viewBox="0 0 448 448" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><g clip-path="url(#clip0_894_1529)"><path d="M448 0H0v448h448V0Z" fill="#F2F2F2"></path><path d="m354.54 158.19-33.31-35.87a59.971 59.971 0 0 0-32.2-18.01l-20.99-4.2c-2.72-.49-5.45-.93-8.17-1.33l-.01.01v-.01c-1.29-.21-2.58-.31-3.88-.29-1.3.01-2.6.14-3.88.38l-7.25 1.36-7.08 1.33c-4.54.85-9.13 1.28-13.72 1.27-4.59 0-9.19-.42-13.72-1.27l-7.08-1.33-7.25-1.36c-1.28-.24-2.58-.37-3.88-.38-1.3-.02-2.6.08-3.88.29v.01l-.01-.01c-2.73.4-5.46.83-8.17 1.33l-20.99 4.2a59.971 59.971 0 0 0-32.2 18.01l-33.31 35.87c-3.03 1.62 0 0 0-1.62-1.62Z" fill="#fff"></path><path d="M185.16 95.82c1.65-.29 3.18.86 3.45 2.52 2.73 17.09 17.53 30.16 35.39 30.16s32.66-13.06 35.39-30.16c.26-1.66 1.79-2.81 3.45-2.52l5.93 1.04c1.59.28 2.68 1.78 2.43 3.38-3.64 22.79-23.38 40.21-47.2 40.21-23.82 0-43.56-17.42-47.2-40.21-.25-1.6.84-3.1 2.43-3.38l5.93-1.04ZM95.82 155.74l-2.23 2.4c-3.03 3.26-2.81 8.37.48 11.36l32.37 29.43c3.16 2.87 8.02 2.76 11.04-.26l2.56-2.56-44.22-40.37Z" fill="#E8AF57"></path><path d="m354.541 158.19-33.31-35.87a59.971 59.971 0 0 0-32.2-18.01l-17.92-3.58c-.57 3.35-1.49 6.59-2.72 9.67l12.12 2.42a59.971 59.971 0 0 1 32.2 18.01l33.31 35.87c2.32 2.49 2.73 6.07 1.32 8.95l6.71-6.1c3.29-2.99 3.51-8.1.48-11.36h.01ZM293.9 195.51a74.154 74.154 0 0 0-10.11 51.02l.04.27c.53 3.19 1.18 6.58 1.84 10.38 1.52 8.8 2.26 17.72 2.26 26.65V295c0 14-9.37 26.26-22.87 29.95a89.888 89.888 0 0 1-42.54 1.17l-15.36-3.29a90.172 90.172 0 0 0-38.42.15l-16.73 3.73v1.41c0 4.42 3.58 8 8 8h128c4.42 0 8-3.58 8-8v-136l-2.1 3.4-.01-.01Z" fill="#E87E69"></path><path d="m352.26 155.74 2.23 2.4c3.03 3.26 2.81 8.37-.48 11.36l-32.37 29.43c-3.16 2.87-8.02 2.76-11.04-.26l-2.56-2.56 44.22-40.37Z" fill="#E8AF57"></path></g><defs><clipPath id="clip0_894_1529"><path fill="#fff" d="M0 0h448v448H0z"></path></clipPath></defs></svg>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                  <div class="hero-product-content-{{ block.id }}">
                    {% if block.settings.product != blank %}
                      <p class="hero-product-title-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.product.title }}</p>
                      <div class="hero-product-price-{{ block.id }}">
                        <p class="hero-product-regular-price-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.product.price | money }}</p>
                        {% if block.settings.product.compare_at_price != blank and block.settings.price_compare %}
                          <strong>-</strong> <p class="hero-product-compare-price-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.product.compare_at_price | money }}</p>
                        {% endif %}
                      </div>
                    {% else %}
                      <p class="hero-product-title-{{ block.id }}">Product</p>
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>

                  {% if block.settings.button != blank %}
                    <a href="{{ block.settings.product.url }}" class="hero-product-button-{{ block.id }}">
                      {{ block.settings.button }}
                       {% if block.settings.button_style == "non_outline_arrow" or block.settings.button_style == "outline_arrow" %}
                          <svg width="192" height="192" viewBox="0 0 192 192" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
                            <path d="M187.827 98.7858C188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.4749 188.123 98.1761C188.419 97.8652 188.419 97.5663 188.704 97.5663C189 96.9566 189 96.6458 189 96.0361C189 95.4263 189 94.8166 188.704 94.5058C188.704 94.195 188.408 93.8961 188.123 93.5852C188.123 93.2744 187.827 93.2744 187.827 92.9755L103.287 4.21945C102.41 3.29889 101.533 3 100.668 3C99.791 3 98.6295 3.31083 98.0488 4.21945C97.1719 5.14 96.8872 6.06058 96.8872 6.96919C96.8872 7.88974 97.1833 9.10918 98.0488 9.7189L175.587 92.0539H6.79206C4.75371 92.0539 3 93.895 3 96.0351C3 98.1751 4.75365 100.016 6.79206 100.016H175.575L97.7543 182.042C96.2967 183.572 96.2967 186.322 97.7543 187.852C99.2119 189.383 101.831 189.383 103.288 187.852L187.827 98.7858Z" fill="black"></path>
                            <path fill-rule="evenodd" clip-rule="evenodd" d="M188.607 97.5657C188.432 97.5657 188.365 97.6788 188.27 97.8382C188.211 97.9378 188.141 98.0554 188.027 98.1748C188.027 98.4734 188.027 98.4734 187.731 98.7839L103.281 187.759C101.825 189.287 99.2085 189.287 97.7524 187.759C96.2963 186.23 96.2963 183.483 97.7524 181.954L175.492 100.013L6.88489 100.013C4.8486 100.013 3.09677 98.1739 3.09677 96.036C3.09677 93.8982 4.84866 92.059 6.88489 92.059L175.504 92.059L98.0465 9.80878C97.182 9.19968 96.8862 7.9815 96.8862 7.0619C96.8862 6.15422 97.1706 5.2346 98.0465 4.315C98.6267 3.40732 99.787 3.0968 100.663 3.0968C101.527 3.0968 102.403 3.39539 103.279 4.315L187.731 92.9796C187.731 93.1274 187.804 93.2021 187.877 93.2774C187.952 93.3543 188.027 93.4319 188.027 93.5887C188.046 93.6098 188.066 93.6308 188.085 93.6518C188.338 93.9267 188.584 94.1935 188.606 94.4689C188.607 94.482 188.607 94.4951 188.607 94.5083C188.903 94.8188 188.903 95.4279 188.903 96.037C188.903 96.6461 188.903 96.9566 188.607 97.5657ZM191.489 93.2767C191.79 93.8661 191.89 94.4204 191.934 94.7363C192.001 95.2226 192 95.7194 192 95.9856L192 96.037C192 96.0544 192 96.0729 192 96.0926C192 96.3523 192.001 96.8096 191.924 97.2931C191.828 97.8884 191.64 98.41 191.393 98.9184L190.546 100.663H190.212C190.127 100.759 190.038 100.852 189.988 100.905L189.974 100.92L105.527 189.891C102.85 192.701 98.1865 192.704 95.51 189.895C94.1476 188.464 93.5636 186.587 93.5636 184.857C93.5636 183.128 94.1468 181.252 95.5071 179.822M191.489 93.2767C191.316 92.7908 191.078 92.4357 190.938 92.2406C190.903 92.1912 190.866 92.142 190.828 92.0939V91.7408L105.522 2.17912C104.076 0.661813 102.397 0 100.663 0C99.3914 0 97.0569 0.401401 95.6212 2.37737C94.3151 3.83819 93.7895 5.45521 93.7895 7.0619C93.7895 8.26663 94.1183 10.6061 95.9608 12.111L168.333 88.9622L6.88489 88.9622C2.9981 88.9622 0 92.3316 0 96.036C0 99.7405 2.99801 103.11 6.88489 103.11L168.285 103.11" fill="black"></path>
                            <path d="M169.5 104L16.5 102.5V90H171L97.5 10.5V7L107.5 4.5C131.167 29.6667 180.2 81.5 187 87.5C193.8 93.5 191.5 99 189.5 101L105.5 184L94 181.5L169.5 104Z" fill="black"></path>
                          </svg>
                        {% endif %}
                    </a>
                  {% endif %}
                  
                </div>
            
            {% endcase %}
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
        {% if count_videos > 0 %}
        <div class="hero-slide-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">
          <div class="hero-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper">
            <button class="hero-slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}">
              <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="1em" height="1em" fill="currentColor" class="text-2xl"><path fill-rule="evenodd" d="M4 8a.5.5 0 0 1 .5-.5h5.793L8.146 5.354a.5.5 0 1 1 .708-.708l3 3a.5.5 0 0 1 0 .708l-3 3a.5.5 0 0 1-.708-.708L10.293 8.5H4.5A.5.5 0 0 1 4 8z"></path></svg>
            </button>
            <div class="swiper-wrapper">
              {% for block in section.blocks %}
                {% assign first_video = true %}
                {% if block.type == "video" %}
                  <div class="hero-slide-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                    {% if use_sound %}
                      <div class="hero-sound-{{ section.id }}">
                        <svg class="hero-mute-{{ section.id }}" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24"><path fill="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z"></path><path d="M5.889 16H2a1 1 0 0 1-1-1V9a1 1 0 0 1 1-1h3.889l5.294-4.332a.5.5 0 0 1 .817.387v15.89a.5.5 0 0 1-.817.387L5.89 16zm14.525-4l3.536 3.536-1.414 1.414L19 13.414l-3.536 3.536-1.414-1.414L17.586 12 14.05 8.464l1.414-1.414L19 10.586l3.536-3.536 1.414 1.414L20.414 12z"></path></svg>  
                        <svg class="hero-unmute-{{ section.id }}" viewBox="0 0 24 24" width="24" height="24"><path fill="none" d="M0 0h24v24H0z"></path><path d="M5.889 16H2a1 1 0 0 1-1-1V9a1 1 0 0 1 1-1h3.889l5.294-4.332a.5.5 0 0 1 .817.387v15.89a.5.5 0 0 1-.817.387L5.89 16zm13.517 4.134l-1.416-1.416A8.978 8.978 0 0 0 21 12a8.982 8.982 0 0 0-3.304-6.968l1.42-1.42A10.976 10.976 0 0 1 23 12c0 3.223-1.386 6.122-3.594 8.134zm-3.543-3.543l-1.422-1.422A3.993 3.993 0 0 0 16 12c0-1.43-.75-2.685-1.88-3.392l1.439-1.439A5.991 5.991 0 0 1 18 12c0 1.842-.83 3.49-2.137 4.591z"></path></svg>
                      </div>
                    {% endif %}
                      <div class="hero-play-{{ section.id }}">
                        <svg aria-hidden="true" viewBox="0 0 24 24">
                          <path d="m6 21 15-9L6 3v18Z"></path>
                        </svg>
                      </div>
                    {%- if block.settings.video != blank  -%}

                      {% if use_progress %}
                        <progress id="progress{{ section.id | replate: '-', '' }}" max="100" value="0"></progress>
                      {% endif %}
          
                      <video {% unless first_video %}data-{% endunless %}src="{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}" muted playsinline {% if first_video %}autoplay{% endif %} {% unless first_video %}class="lazy"{% endunless %}></video>
                    {% else %}
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %}
                  </div>
                  {% assign first_video = false %}
                {% endif %}
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
        {% endif %}
      </div>
    </div>
   {% for block in section.blocks %}
      {% if block.type == "scrolling_text" %}
        {% if block.settings.scrolling_position == "bottom" %}
          <div class="hero-scrolling-wrap-{{ block.id }}">
            <div class="hero-scrolling-list-{{ block.id }}">
              {% for item in (1..10) %}
                <{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="hero-scrolling-item-{{ block.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                    <p class="hero-scrolling-text-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                </{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
            <div class="hero-scrolling-list-{{ block.id }}">
              {% for item in (1..10) %}
                <{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a href="{{ block.settings.url }}"{% else %}div{% endif %} class="hero-scrolling-item-{{ block.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                    <p class="hero-scrolling-text-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                </{% if block.settings.url != blank %}a{% else %}div{% endif %}>
              {% endfor %}
            </div>
          </div>
        {% endif %}
      {% endif %}
    {% endfor %}
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-lazyload@19.1.3/dist/lazyload.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initHero12() {
    var lazyLoadInstance = new LazyLoad();

    setTimeout(() => {
      window.addEventListener("LazyLoad::Initialized",function (event) {
        window.lazyLoadInstance = event.detail.instance;
      }, false );
    },300)
    
    const slider = new Swiper(".hero-slider-{{ section.id }}", {
      speed: 600,
      spaceBetween: 20,
      loop: true,
      navigation: {
        nextEl: '.hero-slider-btn-next-{{ section.id }}',
      },
      breakpoints: {
        320: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: {{ slider_view_mobile }},
          centeredSlides: true
        },
        768: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap_mobile }},
          slidesPerView: 3,
          centeredSlides: true
        },
        1024: {
          spaceBetween: {{ slider_gap }},
          slidesPerView: 1.75,
          centeredSlides: false
        }
      },
      on: {
        slideChange: function () {
          const slides = this.slides;
    
          for (let i = 0; i < slides.length; i++) {
            let video = slides[i].querySelector('video');
            if (i === this.activeIndex) {
              if (video) {
                video.play();
              }

            } else {
              if (video) {
                video.pause();
              }

            }
          }
        },
      },
    });

    document.querySelectorAll('.hero-slide-{{ section.id }}').forEach(el => {
      let soundBtn = el.querySelector('.hero-sound-{{ section.id }}');
      let video = el.querySelector('video');
      let progress = el.querySelector('progress');
      let playBtn = el.querySelector('.hero-play-{{ section.id }}');

      if(video) {

        video.addEventListener('ended', () => {
          video.pause();
    
          slider.slideNext();
        });
        
        if(progress) {
            setInterval(function () {
                if (video.duration && isFinite(video.duration)) {
                    progress.value = Math.round((video.currentTime / video.duration) * 100); 
                }
            }); 
        }
      }

      el.addEventListener('click', (event) => {
        if(el.classList.contains('swiper-slide-active')) {
          if(event.target == el) {
            if(playBtn) {
              if(playBtn.classList.contains('active')) {
                playBtn.classList.remove('active');
  
                if (video) {
                  video.play();
                }
  
              } else {
                playBtn.classList.add('active');
                if (video) {
                  video.pause();
                }
  
              }
            }  
          }
        }
      })

      if(playBtn) {
        playBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
          if(playBtn.classList.contains('active')) {
            playBtn.classList.remove('active');

            if (video) {
              video.play();
            }

          } else {
            playBtn.classList.add('active');
            if (video) {
              video.pause();
            }

          }
        })
      }

      if(soundBtn) {
        soundBtn.addEventListener('click', () => {
          soundBtn.classList.toggle('active');
          if(soundBtn.classList.contains('active')) {
            if(video) {
              video.muted = false;
            }
          } else {
            if(video) {
              video.muted = true;
            }
          }
        });
      }
    });
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initHero12);
  
  if (Shopify.designMode) {
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initHero12);
     document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initHero12);
  }
</script>
